title: Executive Order 5474-Extension of Trust Period on Homesteads Made to Indians of the Niobrara or Santee Reservation, Nebraska
content: It is hereby ordered, under authority contained in the act of June 21, 1906 (34 Stat. 325-326), that the trust period on homesteads made to the following named Indians of the Niobrara or Santee Reservation, Nebr., which trust expires December 28, 1930, be, and is hereby, extended for a period of 10 years.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5474-Extension of Trust Period on Homesteads Made to Indians of the Niobrara or Santee Reservation, Nebraska Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/276864
